title: Library Management System
description: Library Management System is a web-based application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows users to manage books and library members. It includes features like adding/removing books, borrowing/returning books, and user management. The system also incorporates unit testing and manual testing to ensure functionality, input validation, and responsiveness across devices.
